text: Soni Jwalakwe ni Ajula juwagumbile mawunde ni mataka m’masiku nsano nalimo, soni Arishi Jakwe (Chindanda Chaulungu) jaliji pachanya pa mesi, (jwaatesile yalakweyi) kuti an’diije wanganyammwe yanti wani mwa jenumanja watapanganye masengo gambone nnope. Nambo naga n’di mwasalile yanti: “Chisimu wanganyammwe chinchiukulidwa panyuma pakuwa.” Awala wakufuulu akutiji: “Nganiuwatu walakweu ikaweje usawi wakuonechela.”
